statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences
SELECT customer_id, personalized_preferences FROM customer_preferences
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, dietary_restrictions FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT customer_id, personalized_preferences, dietary_restrictions FROM customer_preferences
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, personalized_preferences ->> 'color' AS favorite_color FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 50;
SELECT customer_id, personalized_preferences -> 'hobbies' AS hobbies FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id IN (10, 20, 30) ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, personalized_preferences ->> 'food_category' AS food_category FROM customer_preferences WHERE dietary_restrictions @> '{"allergies": ["nuts"]}';
SELECT customer_id, personalized_preferences -> 'preferences' ->> 'music_genre' AS music_genre FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id < 50;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference_description FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_name = 'vegan';
SELECT * FROM dietary_restrictions ORDER BY restriction_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, restriction_name FROM dietary_restrictions WHERE restriction_type = 'allergy';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_description FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_name = 'vegetarian';
SELECT customer_id, restriction_name FROM dietary_restrictions WHERE restriction_type = 'allergy';
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_description FROM customer_preferences JOIN dietary_restrictions ON customer_preferences.customer_id = dietary_restrictions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, restriction_type FROM customer_preferences JOIN dietary_restrictions ON customer_preferences.customer_id = dietary_restrictions.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preference_id, dietary_preference FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, restriction_id, dietary_restriction FROM customers JOIN restrictions ON customers.customer_id = restrictions.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preferences JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, cuisine_type FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT customer_name, dietary_restriction FROM customers JOIN restrictions ON customers.customer_id = restrictions.customer_id WHERE dietary_restriction = 'Vegetarian';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, dietary_preference FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE dietary_preference = 'Vegan';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM meals WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT meal_name, ingredients FROM meals ORDER BY meal_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, meal_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN meals ON orders.meal_id = meals.meal_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE dietary_restrictions IS NOT NULL
SELECT cuisine_type, meal_time FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT * FROM meals ORDER BY cuisine_type DESC, meal_name ASC
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 3 AND order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT dish_name, ingredients, price FROM menu WHERE price < 15 ORDER BY dish_name;
SELECT customer_name, preferences, dietary_restrictions FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT dish_name, price FROM menu ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, num_guests FROM customers JOIN reservations ON customers.customer_id = reservations.customer_id;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, rating, review_text FROM restaurant_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
